title: Acupuncture for Pain Management
cleaned_text: Tuesday November 14, 2023 6:00 p.m. - 7:00 p.m. This is an online event. [Back to calendar](/calendar-events-classes) Acupuncture can be an effective tool for managing chronic pain, especially in the treatment of headaches, neck pain, back pain, osteoarthritis, fibromyalgia, and cancer. Learn how this gentle, noninvasive holistic treatment can be used to complement a traditional pain management plan. Led by Shannon DiCarlo, LAc, DAOM The Graf Center for Integrative Medicine Fees and Registration Free workshop - *Preregistration required* Zoom Meeting information to follow in your order confirmation. Online registration closes on Monday, November 13 at 6:00 p.m. If registration has closed, please email or call us directly to register. grafcenter@ehmchealth.org 201-608-2377 Treatments Acupuncture treatments are available by appointment. The Graf Center accepts most insurance plans for acupuncture and will gladly verify your benefits. If insurance does not cover your session, out-of-pocket rates are
